paths: Obvious paths: north, east, south, west
description: Centered in the meadow as a focal point is a large sapphire silk pavilion with several alabaster pennants bearing the Illistim crest flying above.  Large ceramic pots filled with blooming white rosebushes have been placed at intervals around the exterior.  A pair of crystal lanterns hanging from ornate iron posts flanks the entrance to the gathering space.  Lit candles shine from the interior of each, casting a bright glow over the clearing.
title: [Lumnea Meadow]
